name: Bookpals
description: A full-stack application with full CRUD that allows users to share information about their favorite books. The database was seeded with data pulled from the NY Times API.

name: Bookmark Collector
description: A command-line application built with python and PostgreSQL that allows users to store data about their favorite websites. This application has full CRUD and a GUI that uses Tkinter to enhance user experience

name: Fairytale Trivia
description: An application that uses DOM manipulation to allow users to test their knowledge and origins of popular fairytales.

name: CoTripper
description: An open-source client project designed to facilitate group travel experiences for single mothers.

name: Component Library
description: A React component library comprised of buttons, checkboxes, thumbnails, forms, counters, and icons that can be reused and modified for various websites.

name: Simon Says Game
description: An application that allows users to test their memory, based on the popular Simon game.

name: Tinder Mock Site
description: A website mock up based on a popular dating application
